input_query:
You plan to visit 4 European cities for 19 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You would like to visit Dublin for 7 days. You plan to visit relatives in Dublin between day 7 and day 13. You want to spend 3 days in Athens. You would like to meet your friends at Athens between day 1 and day 3 to tour together. You would like to visit Tallinn for 7 days. You would like to visit Santorini for 5 days.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Athens and Dublin, Athens and Santorini, Dublin and Tallinn, Santorini and Dublin.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 19 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
